name: content_team
description: A complete content creation and management workflow
author: LeMMing Team
readme:
# Content Team Department

This department manages the complete content creation workflow from planning to publishing.

## Workflow
1. Content Planner creates content calendar
2. Content Writer drafts articles
3. Content Editor reviews and edits
4. Content Publisher approves and publishes

## Installation
Copy all agent folders to your agents/ directory and run bootstrap.

## Configuration
- Each agent has its own schedule and permissions
- Adjust run_every_n_ticks to control frequency
- Modify permissions to change who reads whose outbox
